title: Petro Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: In November 2014, he became a People's Deputy of Ukraine with 64.04% of votes in constituency No.12. Poroshenko became a grandfather on the day of his presidential inauguration, 7 June 2014. His wife is actively involved in the activities of the Petro Poroshenko Charity Foundation.

title: Maryna Poroshenko - Wikipedia
snippet: Maryna Anatoliyvna Poroshenko (Ukrainian: Марина Анатоліївна Порошенко, née Perevedentseva; born 1 February 1962) is a Ukrainian cardiologist who served as First Lady of Ukraine from 2014 to 2019, as wife of President Petro Poroshenko.

title: Petro Poroshenko Biography - Facts, Childhood, Family Life & Achievements
snippet: He was given the Order of Merit by Ukraine, Order of the Republic by Moldova, Order of Civil Merit by Spain, among other titles. ... Petro Poroshenko is married to Maryna Perevedentseva, a cardiologist, since 1984.

title: Maryna Poroshenko appointed head of Ukrainian Cultural Foundation
snippet: Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko’s wife, Maryna Poroshenko, has been appointed head of the Ukrainian Cultural Foundation, and the organization’s executive director will be selected through a competition, which is to be held from Jan.22 ...
